#summary RPC Methods and Description

= ZDStack Action Methods =
|| Method || Usage || Return Value || Implemented || Tested ||
|| start_zserv() || {{{start_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || yes ||
|| stop_zserv() || {{{stop_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || yes ||
|| restart_zserv() || {{{restart_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || yes ||
|| start_all_zservs() || {{{start_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| stop_all_zservs() || {{{stop_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| restart_all_zservs() || {{{restart_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| reload_config() || {{{reload_config()}}} || True on Success || yes || yes ||

= ZDStack Info Methods =
|| Method || Usage || Return Value || Implemented || Tested ||
|| get_zserv() || {{{get_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || a ZservDict || yes || yes ||
|| get_all_zservs() || {{{get_all_zservs()}}} || a list of ZservDict instances || yes || yes ||
|| list_zserv_names() || {{{list_zserv_names()}}} || a list of zserv names as strings || yes || yes ||

= ZServ Action Methods =
|| Method || Usage || Return Value || Implemented || Tested ||
|| set_zserv_config() || {{{set_zserv_config(zserv_name), config_data}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| addban() || {{{addban(zserv_name, ip_address, reason)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| addbot() || {{{addbot(zserv_name, bot_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| addmap() || {{{addmap(zserv_name, map_number)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| clearmaplist() || {{{clearmaplist(zserv_name) || True on Success || yes || no ||
|| kick() || {{{kick(zserv_name, player_number, reason) || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| killban() || {{{killban(zserv_name, ip_address)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| map() || {{{map(map_number)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| removebots() || {{{removebots(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| resetscores() || {{{resetscores(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| say() || {{{say(zserv_name, message)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| set() || {{{set(zserv_name, var_name, var_value)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| toggle() || {{{toggle(zserv_name, var_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| unset() || {{{unset(zserv_name, var_name)}}} || True on Success || yes || partially ||
|| send_to_zserv() || {{{send_to_zserv(zserv_name, message}}} || None || yes || yes ||

= ZServ Info Methods =
|| Method || Usage || Return Value || Implemented || Tested ||
|| get_uptime() || {{{get_uptime(zserv_name)}}} || seconds as an int || yes || no ||
|| get_status() || {{{get_status(zserv_name)}}} || ZServ status as a string, either 'Stopped' or 'Running' || yes || no ||
|| get_zserv_config() || {{{get_zserv_config(zserv_name)}}} || a String representing the ZServ's configuration || yes || yes ||
|| list_player_names() || {{{list_player_names(zserv_name)}}} || a list of player names as strings || yes || yes ||
|| get_player() || {{{get_player(zserv_name, player_name)}}} || a PlayerDict || yes || yes ||
|| get_team() || {{{get_team(zserv_name, team_color)}}} || a TeamDict || yes || yes ||
|| get_current_map() || {{{get_current_map(zserv_name)}}} || a MapDict || yes || yes ||
|| get_all_players() || {{{get_all_players(zserv_name)}}} || a list of PlayerDict instances || yes || yes ||
|| get_all_teams() || {{{get_all_teams(zserv_name)}}} || a list of TeamDict instances || yes || yes ||
|| get_remembered_stats() || {{{get_remembered_stats(zserv_name, back=1)}}} || a StatDict || yes || yes ||
